law.catch_line: Duties of board -- Authority to promulgate administrative regulations.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 594, sec. 5, effective January 1, 1999. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (9/11/001). The Reviser of Statutes, acting under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), has corrected the statutory reference in subsection (6) of this section to read "KRS 335.332." It is evident from an examination of 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 594, sec. 5, that this is the intended citation.
